Title: Record: Temporal Disruption and Sonoro Sphere
Text:
The Temporal Disruption and the Sonoro Sphere became intricately linked because of malfunctions in the Sentinel's Temporal Mandate, making them inseparable. To safeguard against any deviations, my old friend offered to encase the Sonoro Sphere within a specific medium, turning it into our fail-safe plan.

My new apprenticeâ€™s Forte of Flame Manipulation is crucial for destroying the Sonoro Sphere, a task that only she can accomplish. On the other hand, my old friend is the only one who can unlock said Sonoro Sphere. Both individuals are vital to the success of our goal. Yet, unleashing the full power of Flame Manipulation would exact a toll far too heavy for a mere child to endure.

It seems this game shall stay unfinished for many moons to come.
